appointment.content: We are dedicated to exceeding client expectations through well-defined quality processes and providing time-bound, cost-effective solutions. Our holistic, interactive, versatile, and accurate approach ensures we deliver exceptional value and contribute to the industry's advancement.
appointment.title: Zeal Insurance: Excellence in Service and Innovation

items.content: Our Risk Management Group offers insurance audits, gap analysis, risk inspections, claims management, and enterprise risk management. We help clients identify and mitigate risks for optimal protection.
items.title: Tailored Risk Management Solutions

items.content: Our General Insurance Group offers tailored insurance solutions for sectors like construction, engineering, fire, motor, marine, credit, financial, oil, energy, life, and health. We customize our products to meet your specific needs and industry requirements.
items.title: Diverse Insurance Coverage

hero.content: Zeal strives to offer its customers a range of strategic and simple solution with special expertise in Aviation, Marine,  Construction & Property, Energy, Reinsurance, Strategic Risk Management and Natural Catastrophe Insurance.
hero.subtitle: Experience the difference of working with an insurance specialist.
hero.title: Zeal Insurance: Your Trusted Partner for Risk Management and Insurance Solutions

items.content: Provides financial protection to individuals and groups in case of death or critical illness.
items.title: Life Insurance

items.content: Covers medical expenses and personal accident-related costs.
items.title: Health Insurance

items.content: Protects against fire damage and losses related to business interruption.
items.title: Fire and LOP Insurance

items.content: Covers damage to vehicles, personal injury, and third-party liability.
items.title: Motor Insurance

items.content: Specialized coverage for oil, gas, and mining operations, addressing unique risks in these sectors.
items.title: Energy Risks Insurance

items.content: Insures construction projects against risks like property damage, liability, and delays.
items.title: Construction and Engineering Insurance

items.content: Mitigates financial risks associated with large-scale infrastructure and development projects.
items.title: Project Finance Insurance

items.content: Protects businesses from losses due to non-payment by buyers and offers various financial risk solutions.
items.title: Trade Credit and Financial Lines Insurance

items.content: Coverage against losses caused by political instability, terrorism, and related events.
items.title: Political and Terrorism Risk Insurance

items.content: Includes Directors & Officers liability, Professional Liability (Errors & Omissions), and Bankers Blanket Bond, safeguarding professionals and businesses against negligence claims.
items.title: Professional Risks Insurance

items.content: Protection against cyber attacks, data breaches, cybercrime, and related liabilities.
items.title: Cyber Liability and Crime Insurance

items.content: Covers businesses against claims of bodily injury or property damage caused by their products or operations, including product recall.
items.title: Public and Product Liability Insurance

items.content: Protection against claims arising from employment-related issues like discrimination, harassment, and wrongful termination.
items.title: Employment Practices Liability Insurance

items.content: Coverage for ransom payments, response costs, and other expenses related to kidnapping and extortion events.
items.title: Kidnap & Ransom Insurance

items.content: Specialized coverage for events, exhibitions, matches, and film productions, protecting against a range of potential risks.
items.title: Event Insurance

items.content: Comprehensive coverage for businesses involved in transporting goods using multiple modes of transport.
items.title: Multi-Modal Transport Operators Insurance

items.content: Provides extended coverage for products beyond the manufacturer's original warranty period.
items.title: Extended Warranty Insurance

items.content: Protects the assets and interests of Indian businesses operating in foreign countries.
items.title: Indian Interest Abroad Insurance

whyus.content: We are committed to redefining professionalism and excellence in the insurance industry. Our core values of professionalism, trust, commitment, good corporate citizenship, ethics, and innovation drive us to deliver exceptional service and client-centric solutions. We prioritize understanding our clients' needs and challenges to provide research-based solutions at competitive prices while maximizing shareholder wealth through efficient resource utilization.
whyus.title: Why Choose Zeal Insurance?

company_overview.headline: About Zeal Insurance
company_overview.paragraph_1: Zeal Direct And Reinsurance Broking Services Private Ltd, India is licensed, regulated and controlled by Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority (IRDA), the insurance regulatory body in India. It is also a member of the Insurance Brokers Association of India. It aims to offer its clients the most innovative Risk Transfer Alternatives and Reinsurance Solutions in all classes of business. We help clients find the best coverage at the right price that suits their needs and expectations.
company_overview.paragraph_2:
We are a network of seasoned professionals from Direct Insurance and Reinsurance Companies with a wealth of experience in Prudent Underwriting, Claims Management, Portfolio Analysis, Reinsurance Placements and Risk Management Guidance. 
 The day to day business operations are managed by the Principal Officer assisted by well qualified professional staffs. We have access to all major domestic and international Insurance and Reinsurance markets and have close relationships with 'A' rated International Reinsurance companies. 
 The company has excellent relationship in London for handling major specialist business at Lloyds and other market players.

mission_vision.heading: Our Mission & Vision
mission_vision.mission:
Identifying the particular needs and challenges of our client and strive constantly to seek the research based solutions at competitive price for them.
 Applying the latest technology and operating at the highest level of efficiency, quality and prudence. 
 Developing highly motivated team of professionals with appropriate skills.
 Maximising shareholder wealth through efficient utilization of resources.
mission_vision.vision: We identify client's needs and challenges to provide research-based solutions at competitive prices, while maximizing shareholder wealth through efficient resource utilization.

philosophy_approach.approach: One of our most important assets is the relationships that we have with our clients. We are focused on building enduring relationships that are based on professionalism, transparency and competence. We believe that nurturing long-term relationships begins with listening to our clients, anticipating their needs, and working together with them to find the right solutions. It also means having a deep understanding of the risk environment and the markets in which our clients operate. We aim to assist our clients in the countries where they operate.
philosophy_approach.heading: Our Philosophy & Approach
philosophy_approach.philosophy: Our business philosophy is to grow with the smaller accounts without discriminating in favor of our equally valued larger clients. No account is too big for us to handle promptly and efficiently, and nothing is too small or uneconomical for us to deal with once we have sought and accepted a client's portfolio of business. We believe that our business is both people focused and people orientated. We adhere to the highest standards of ethical and professional conduct.

professional_role.follow_up: We provide comprehensive claims service and cost-effective, specialized insurance solutions, prioritizing our clients' best interests. Our commitment to excellence, professionalism, and innovation ensures top-tier customer service and industry contributions.
professional_role.heading: Our Professional Role
professional_role.placement: As an independent service provider, we negotiate the best insurance terms by fostering competition among insurers and reinsurers. This ensures our clients receive the most favorable coverage tailored to their needs.
